products.title: Pastel de Nata
products.description: Creamy custard tart with a crispy puff pastry base and a hint of cinnamon. The hallmark of Portuguese pastry.

products.title: Bola de Berlim
products.description: Fluffy fried dough, sprinkled with sugar and filled with a delicious egg cream. A beach classic.

products.title: Travesseiro de Sintra
products.description: Puff pastry sweet with an irresistible filling of almond and egg cream. A specialty of Sintra.

products.title: Queijada de Sintra
products.description: Small tart of fresh cheese and eggs, with a unique and traditional flavor from the town of Sintra.

products.title: Pão de Ló de Ovar
products.description: Spongy and moist cake in the center, with a thin, golden crust. Sold whole.

products.title: Bolo de Arroz
products.description: Individual small cake with a mild lemon flavor and a distinct texture. Perfect for a snack.

products.title: Ovos Moles de Aveiro
products.description: Sweet made of egg yolks and sugar, wrapped in a thin wafer in marine shapes. Treasure of Aveiro.

products.title: Salame de Chocolate
products.description: Chocolate and Maria biscuit roll, a delight that pleases all ages. (Slice)

products.title: Torta de Azeitão
products.description: Fluffy tart with egg filling, hand-rolled and sprinkled with sugar. (Slice)

products.title: Guardanapo
products.description: Fluffy cake shaped like a napkin, filled with a generous egg cream.

products.title: Pão de Deus
products.description: Sweet and fluffy bread with a shredded coconut and sugar topping. Simply divine!

products.title: Jesuíta
products.description: Triangular puff pastry with a crispy glaze topping. A conventual temptation.

products.title: Mil-folhas
products.description: Layers of crispy puff pastry interspersed with pastry cream and a glaze topping.

products.title: Arroz Doce
products.description: Creamy rice cooked in milk, flavored with lemon peel and decorated with cinnamon. (Bowl)

products.title: Leite Creme
products.description: Creamy milk and egg dessert with a layer of sugar torched at the moment. (Bowl)

products.title: Bolo Rei
products.description: Traditional Christmas cake, in the shape of a crown, with candied fruits and nuts.

products.title: Folar da Páscoa
products.description: Traditional Easter sweet bread, flavored with cinnamon and anise, sometimes with a boiled egg.

products.title: Toucinho do Céu
products.description: Dense almond and egg yolk cake, a conventual recipe with history and a heavenly taste. (Slice)

products.title: Bolo de Bolacha
products.description: Layers of Maria biscuit soaked in coffee, alternated with a delicious butter cream. (Slice)

products.title: Palmier
products.description: Puff pastry biscuit, caramelized and crispy, in the shape of a heart or an ear.
